explanations.machine learning: The paper mentions the use of machine learning models to examine the impact of COVID-19 on industry risk.
explanations.regression: The paper proposes a Value-at-Risk (VaR) measurement based on quantile regression neural network (QRNN), which involves regression techniques.
explanations.neural network: The paper introduces a quantile regression neural network (QRNN) model for financial risk measurement.
explanations.deep learning: The use of neural networks, particularly QRNN, indicates the application of deep learning techniques in the study.
